header.tooltip: Designed and coded by Creative Tim

home.starter-kit-description: Presentation of Angular concepts and features for reuse in a project.
home.angular-description: Angular is an open-source web application development framework based on TypeScript. It is designed to simplify the creation of complex web applications by providing a solid structure and advanced features for data management, navigation, routing, and user interface implementation.
home.best-practices-description: Features while enabling rapid evolution and easy maintenance.
home.collaboration-description: This project is designed so that every developer in the team can easily contribute thanks to a clear structure and modern tools such as Docker and WSL 2.
home.docker-description: Docker: An essential tool for standardizing development environments and simplifying deployment processes.
home.wsl-description: Subsystem for Linux (WSL 2): A solution for Windows developers, providing a native development experience close to Linux.
home.vscode-description: Visual Studio Code (VS Code): The recommended code editor, enriched with extensions facilitating development with Angular and Docker.
